text: Na satthapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na satthapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 59. I will not teach Dhamma to a person with a knife in his hand who is not ill: a training to be observed.
๕๙. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่แสดงธรรมแก่บุคคลไม่ใช่ผู้เจ็บไข้มีศัสตราในมือ”
59. I shall not teach Dhamma to one with a knife in his hand who is not sick: this is a training to be done.
